title: Noam Chomsky: Is This the End of American Empire?
description:
Professor Noam Chomsky discusses whether the withdrawal of US troops from Afghanistan marks the end—or a new stage—of American empire.

Full interview: https://youtu.be/uwznEEtcBls

Subscribe to the channel and hit the like button!
